title: Fortnite maker Epic Games cutting 16% of workforce
description: The company says it is shedding the staff because it's spending "way more" than it earns

title: PlayStation boss Jim Ryan to retire from Sony next year
description: He said he took the decision due to issues he had living in Europe while working in North America.

title: Watch: The Robot wolves trying to scare off Japan's bears
description: A howling 'monster wolf' is scaring wild bears away from the city of Takikawa.

title: X scraps tool to report electoral fake news - researchers
description: A research organisation says the feature is now only available in European Union countries.
